document.full_text: john lackey beat his former team again with eight superb innings, and the visiting red sox completed a pitching-dominated four-game sweep of the los angeles angels.
document.title: baseball roundup: red sox sweep the angels as pitchers pave the way
lines_and_colors: john lackey beat his former team again with eight superb innings, and the visiting red sox completed a pitching-dominated four-game sweep of the los angeles angels.
